mapper.insert: insert into application ( application_id, id, class_id, accept_yn, application_contents, reg_date ) values ( application_seq.nextval, #{id}, #{class_id}, 'W', #{application_contents}, sysdate )
mapper.select: select a.*, u.id, u.nickname, u.profile_photo, c.class_reg_user_id, c.current_std_count, c.max_std_count, rb.title from application a, users u, recruitment_board rb, class c where a.class_id = c.class_id and a.id = u.id and c.class_id = rb.class_id
